de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.unlabeled.epinions

Class ExtractSentencesFromXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.unlabeled.epinions.ExtractSentencesFromXML

  • public class ExtractSentencesFromXML
extends java.lang.Object
    Extract all sentences and texts from review in XML file in format (Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay 2009)
    Author:
    kesslewd

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Extract all sentences and texts from review in XML file in format (Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay 2009) Two input files: - xmlEpinionsFile: Reviews in XML format - idIgnoreFile: review ids that should be ignored Format: 1 id per line Two output files: - outputSentences: sentences as split by sentence splitter, tokenized Format: id \t sentence tokenized, one sentence per line - outputTexts: complete text of all reviews, one sentence per line, separated by empty lines * Format: id \n sentence tokenized, one sentence per line\n \n

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtractSentencesFromXML

        public ExtractSentencesFromXML()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Extract all sentences and texts from review in XML file in format (Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay 2009) Two input files: - xmlEpinionsFile: Reviews in XML format - idIgnoreFile: review ids that should be ignored Format: 1 id per line Two output files: - outputSentences: sentences as split by sentence splitter, tokenized Format: id \t sentence tokenized, one sentence per line - outputTexts: complete text of all reviews, one sentence per line, separated by empty lines * Format: id \n sentence tokenized, one sentence per line\n \n
        Parameters:
        args - [1] XML input file name, [2] file that contains the ids of reviews to be ignored [3] output file name for sentences [4] (optional) output file name for texts
